headline: Pinterest Earnings Miss Tests AI Pivot And New Board Direction
summary: Pinterest (NYSE:PINS) reported Q4 results that did not meet revenue expectations and issued revenue guidance below prior consensus. The company cited external shocks, including tariffs, as key headwinds to recent performance and its outlook. Recent announcements include significant layoffs, a global restructuring focused on AI driven product investment, and the appointment of Ulta Beauty CEO Kecia Steelman to the board. Pinterest runs a visual discovery and shopping platform that connects...
